code: import React from'react';import{CommandType}from'../../../commands/commandTypes';import styles from'./TypeSpecificFields.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TypeSpecificFields=props=>{const{type,fields,handleFieldChange}=props;switch(type){case CommandType.Navigate:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:styles.label,children:["URL:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:styles.input,type:"text",name:"url",value:fields.url||'',onChange:handleFieldChange})]});case CommandType.Copy:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:styles.label,children:["Text to Copy:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:styles.input,type:"text",name:"textToCopy",value:fields.textToCopy||'',onChange:handleFieldChange})]});default:return null;}};export default TypeSpecificFields;
